Text: guyz who want to are having problemes on putting it into flash drives...just split it  into 3 4gb parts with split4g and put the files into a folder(name it packages)...copy the folder into a flash drive(fat 32) then put the whole folder into the hdd_0 from the multiman..multiman will automatically join the file..run the file in multiman and install it through the install package menu on the xmb..ENJOY :)
